title: Ryan Gigg's ex moves new boyfriend The Wanted's Max George into her home
text:
Get the biggest celebs stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Looks like a home win for the Blues… the ex-wife of Man United legend Ryan Giggs has moved her pop star lover into their mansion – and he’s a lifelong Man City supporter.

Stacey Giggs has welcomed former The Wanted singer Max George into her home just seven months after they started dating.

Celebrity Big Brother star Stacey, 40, fell for avid Blues fan Max after the pair met at a local pub.

He was spotted moving his belongings the short distance from his modest pad to the £3.5million home in Worsley, near Manchester, which ex-Old Trafford winger Ryan had shared with Stacey.

(Image: WireImage)

A source said: “They’re head-over-heels in love – Max moving in has come pretty quickly but they’re smitten so it just feels right.”

Stacey even presented him with a Manchester City birthday cake when he turned 31 last month.

The source added: “It’s quite surreal for Max really – he’s a massive City fan and yet he’s dating Giggsy’s ex-wife and living in his old house.”

Giggs, 45, played for United for his entire professional career.

(Image: AFP)

In 37 games against City during 24 years at the club, he claimed four of his 114 career goals against the local rivals. He and Stacey finalised a £40million divorce in 2017 after he cheated on her with Big Brother star Imogen Thomas during their 10-year marriage.

Max – who was once engaged to former Corrie star Michelle Keegan , 32 – gets on well with Stacey and Ryan’s children Liberty, 16, and Zach, 13.

And he has told how he would love to settle down with his new love. He said: “I’ve always wanted to get married, and I love kids.

(Image: Getty)

"I wouldn’t be with her if I didn’t see a future. I don’t want to jinx it, but I can really see myself ending up with Stace.

“But we’re just enjoying seeing how things go at the moment.”

Talking of how they met through mutual friends, he said: “I just thought, ‘Wow, she is beautiful’.

“We hit it off straightaway, we just really got each other.”

Cardiff-born Giggs, who now manages Wales, is dating Kate Greville, 35, PR boss at the hotel and bar business he set up with ex Man United co-star Gary Neville.

The pair went public after he took her on holiday to Italy eight months after his divorce.
description: EXCLUSIVE: Stacey Giggs has welcomed former The Wanted singer Max George into her home just seven months after they started dating
